body:
Hi, i'm writing to you because i got banned for using "Forcefield". I really want to play Avicus Network because my ban is not correct. There's some proof that i don't use hacks:

Test 1: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ndCHZYPM9P4

Test 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3tGQ6ZmZ55U

Test 3: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lh3swnlxP1o

Test 4:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uHaUxt8Nguk

Cheers, The_AlaSK_Fin.

title: Ban Appeal

replies.body: Sorry but this isnt the place for a ban appeal, pls appeal at support@avicus.net I think but I am no Mod
replies.body_tagged: Sorry but this isnt the place for a ban appeal, pls appeal at support@avicus.net I think but I am no Mod

replies.body: Please email Avicus or contact them easily here : http://avicus.net/support Go to the bottom of the page thanks.
replies.body_tagged: Please email Avicus or contact them easily here : http://avicus.net/support Go to the bottom of the page thanks.

replies.body: Appeal at support@avicus.net if you were banned. The forums are NOT the place for this.
replies.body_tagged: Appeal at support@avicus.net if you were banned. The forums are NOT the place for this.
